content: If you were running a race and you passed the person in 2nd place, what place would you be in now?

If I passed the person who was in 2nd place, that means I have taken their position. So, I would now be in 2nd place. The person I passed would then be in 3rd place. It's like in a race, if you overtake the runner who was ahead of you, you swap places with them. So, I would be in 2nd place now.
